general_advisory: Due to low temperature, apply thin layer of dry FYM on nursery to maintain the temperature. Start sowing the summer crops when the temperature is conducive for germination.

advisory: Collect and sow Mung varieties IPM-02-14, IPM-02-3, PDM-11, PDM-54, Durga, Samrat, K-851 with 25 kg of seeds per hectare
Treat seeds with Carbendazim and rizobium culture before sowing
Sow in spacing of 25cm x 10cm
Transplant seedlings at 3 weeks old in 20cm x 10cm spacing
Apply 24:12:12 kg NPK per acre if soil not tested
Top dress paddy with 16 kg Nitrogen per acre at 3 weeks
Top dress paddy with 16 kg Nitrogen per acre at 3 weeks
Provide daily irrigation for optimal growth
Irrigate at critical stages for higher tiller production
Transplant 10-12 days old seedling on main field
Apply mustard oil to reduce moth infestation
Intercultivate and earthwork at 2-3 weeks old
Apply 8 kg Nitrogen per acre
Apply gypsum at sowing if not applied earlier
Irrigate at specific stages
Apply Nitrogen per acre depending on sowing time
Apply 6-8 kg nitrogen per acre at 25-30 days after sowing
Choose good varieties and proper spacing
Apply necessary fertilizers and seeds treatments
Intercept and earthwork in delayed sown crop
Manage Leaf blight with Mancozeb
Apply remaining Nitrogen fertilizer
Manage Brinjal Foot & Shoot borer with Neem-based pesticides
Control leaf spot with specific sprays
